          <title>
            <string language="en">Veiwing Binary stars from different perspectives</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Veiwing Doppelsterne von den unterschiedlichen 
Perspektiven</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Veiwing binaire tient le premier rôle de différentes

perspectivas</string>

          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">animations whichshow a binary star system viewed from three different angles</string>

          </keyword>

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">whichshow de las animaciones un sistema de la
